mapper.insert: insert into article(a_title, a_content, a_summary, a_cover, a_view_count, a_update_time, a_status, a_type_id) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{summary}, #{cover}, #{viewCount}, #{updateTime}, #{status}, #{typeId});
mapper.update: update article set a_title=#{title}, a_content=#{content}, a_summary=#{summary}, a_cover=#{cover}, a_view_count=#{viewCount}, a_update_time=#{updateTime}, a_status=#{status}, a_type_id=#{typeId} where a_id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from article where a_status = 1 order by a_update_time desc;
